text: trong ban banhchouh tukaphlieng pileu mekh haey chrolng neanea ban haur towteam konlong robsa vea daoy kar haur noh ban neamk nouv ppouh rik khpasa cheachraen . haey avei delke yk tow dot vea nowknong phleung daembi chamreanh chea krueng a longkea ryy robsa braebreasa ka mean ppouh dauch knea der . dauchnaoh der a l laoh briebthieb rueng pit ning rueng min pit . chamnek e ppouh ku nung trauv rleay bat . haey chamnek e avei del meanobrayoch dl mnoussaalok vea nung sthetnow leu phendei . dauchnaoh der a l laoh leuk uteahar phe sa ng cheachraen tiet
